update pcms_settlement_item set itid = #{itid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sedetail_id = #{sedetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sedetail_money = #{sedetailMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sedetail_memo = #{sedetailMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_type = #{taxType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_number = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_rate = #{taxRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_last = #{isLast,jdbcType=INTEGER}, settlement_number = #{settlementNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fssc_bill = #{fsscBill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where setid = #{setid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.setid, a.settlement_number AS settNumber, b.item_number AS itemNumber, a.sedetail_memo AS sedetailMemo, a.tax_type AS taxType, a.invoice_number AS invoiceNumber, a.is_last AS isLast, a.sedetail_money AS sedetailMoney FROM pcms_settlement_item a LEFT JOIN pcms_item b ON a.itid = b.itid WHERE a.itid = #{itid}
